title: The world's Hardest game - Crazy Cubes 2.2
description:
Alternative Download Link(use this link if Torrent is Dead): http://crazycubes.co.nf/count/click.php?id=11

The above Link downloads The .exe(installer) Directly from my Website & it's not a torrent file.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Crazy Cubes 2.2

This Update adds an awesome Update Tool! The Update Tool is Built into the Game Engine & you check for updates within the Game Menu. If a newer Version  is found, Game shuts down & the update will download automatically. 

Other Changes in 2.2

* Optimized code
* Anti-cheat Engine polished
* Quick button from the InGame - Menu(Opens The Webpage)
* Minor Design changes
* New Domain (www.crazycubes.net)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Crazy Cubes 2.1

Updates & changes (2014 - 10 - 24):

* New Menu Design
* New Fonts
* Updated Anti - Cheat Engine
* Bug Fixed  

The First person To Complete the New Version 2.1 will be awarded with 30 euros on Steam (Gifts)

The winner can pick any game/games for a value of Max/Total 30Euro

* Terms. In Order to Claim The Price you'll have to "like" Crazy Cubes on Facebook

for more information visit The Webpage: http://www.crazycubes.net
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created By Martin Oskarsson - Free To Download

Website:   <a href="

STEAM_LINK:
(ingame fotage & information)



WILL YOU MAKE IT TO THE TOPLIST?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You controll a Cube & Your task is to survive as long as possible & collect as much points as possible to Unlock New Maps.

You'll have to watch out for the Dark Cubes or any of their Special Items. (lots of things can happen)

For your help there are several Powerups that benefits your cube in different ways. 

While Playing the game you'll also obtain Upgradepoints. These points can be spent in the Shop to upgrade your Cube in different ways:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Game also has a Local Multiplayer Mode [Beta Stadge]

Website & The Game
The Game & The Website is build to communicate. Topscore & Scores will be shown LIVE on the Website(http://crazycubes.net). You can also Share your score with a Special link wich is created everytime you Sync your Score.

The Website will also show the World Records for all 5 Maps, meaning the Player/s that has obtained the highest amount of points will be shown at the top of the Website. 

There are 5-maps wich means there is 5 "World Records" that can be achieved.

This game is an Indie Game Developed By Martin Oskarsson[ME] Given out under The name GoseTech. The game is free & you can share it to anyone you want. 

Everything in the Game Is Created by GoseTech, Except some soundeffects that are Credited in The Credits of the Game. 

IIf You'd find any Bugs, Please Support the development & send an E-mail towith The bug/Crash Details

Website: http://crazycubes.net

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The first one to Complete the game Wins gifts on STEAM (Value 30 Euro)
For more information check the webiste.

I hope Youe Enjoy My work!

Martin Oskarsson / Developer & Founder
